moves.name: X Speed
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Hang in There!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Defense and Sp. Def by 1 stat rank. Applies the Gradual Healing effect to the user.

moves.name: Screech
moves.effect: Lowers the target’s Defense by 2 stat ranks.

passives.name: Clearheaded
passives.description: Prevents the user from becoming confused.

passives.name: First Aid 2
passives.description: Restores the user’s HP by approximately 20% of its maximum HP the first time it is in a pinch each battle.

passives.name: Pokey Trap 1
passives.description: Increases the amount of damage the target takes from being trapped.
